subject: Football
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots Coach Bill Belichick’s philosophies will be sprinkled across the field on Saturday when the No. 1 Gators play the No. 2 Crimson Tide.
snippet: New England Patriots Coach Bill Belichick’s philosophies will be sprinkled across the field on Saturday when the No. 1 Gators play the No. 2 Crimson Tide.
